group.label: 4DIAC-IDE
group.text:
The main changes and improvements in 4DIAC-IDE are:
  • New more modern icon set
  • Added a tree-based FB palette to all FB network editors to avoid dragging from wrong projects
  • Replaced system explorer with a more extensible flexible implementation
  • Adapter connections now have an own separate color
  • Better routing of network links in the system configuration editor when segments are below of a device.
  • Merged ECC, internal variable, and algorithm editor and improved properties for the new ECC editor.
  • Better show the transition order in ECCs.
  • Improved ST parser for better code completion and syntax highlighting.
  • New experimental automatic communication generation plugin.
  • Monitoring of adapter interfaces
  • Reworked monitoring to be more performant on the tool side.
Furthermore many smaller usability improvements and bug fixes. All in all 75 closed issues!

group.label: FORTE
group.text:
The main changes and improvements in FORTE are:
  • Support for new devices: Lego Mindstorms EV3, Raspberry SPS
  • Raw communication layer for plain strings
  • Simplified the thread abstraction class making it easier to port FORTE to new operating systems.
  • Reduced memory requirements of device management by about 2/3rds.
Furthermore many smaller bug fixes. All in all 15 closed issues!

group.label: 4DIAC-LIB
group.text:
The main changes and improvements in 4DIAC-LIB are:
  • Added device definitions for specific FORTE devices like, BeagleBone Black or RaspberryPI

group.label: 4DIAC-Systems
group.text:
The main changes and improvements in 4DIAC-Systems are:
  • Cleaned-up Boiler example
  • Updated all examples to use new device definitions.
